          <title>
            <string language="en">Weight and Mass on the moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht und Masse auf dem Mond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poids et masse sur la lune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peso e massa na lua</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Peso y masa en la luna</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the difference between Mass and Weight and how this is expressed on the moon.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

μάζας και του βάρους και πώς αυτό εκφράζεται στο φεγγάρι.</string>
